products.name: Laptop
products.description: A sleek and powerful laptop with a 15-inch display, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD, and an Intel Core i5 processor. It comes with a wireless mouse, a keyboard, and a backpack. It is ideal for work, gaming, and entertainment.

products.name: Headphones
products.description: A pair of wireless headphones with noise cancellation, Bluetooth connectivity, and a long battery life. They have a comfortable fit, a built-in microphone, and a touch control panel. They are compatible with most devices and offer a high-quality sound experience.

products.name: Coffee Maker
products.description: A programmable coffee maker that can brew up to 12 cups of coffee, with a timer, a pause-and-serve feature, and a warming plate. It has a removable filter basket, a water level indicator, and an auto shut-off function. It is easy to use and clean, and comes with a glass carafe and a measuring spoon.

products.name: Camera
products.description: A digital camera with a 24.2 megapixel sensor, a 3-inch LCD screen, and a 18-55mm lens. It has a fast autofocus, a built-in flash, and a Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity. It can record videos in full HD and take stunning photos in various modes and settings.
